Package yads.doi.sample

Class Summary
Sample The Sample class provides a Sample.main(java.lang.String[]) method which gives a demo of building a simple DObject.
Sample1 The Sample1 class provides a Sample1.main(java.lang.String[]) method which gives a demo of building a simple DObject using named groups, writing the instance out as an RDF description and instantiating a new DObject from this RDF description.
Sample2 The Sample2 class provides a Sample2.main(java.lang.String[]) method which gives a demo of building a simple DObject using anonymous groups, writing the instance out as an RDF description and instantiating a new DObject from this RDF description.
Sample3 The Sample3 class provides a Sample3.main(java.lang.String[]) method which gives a demo of building an extended DObject using cascaded method calls which build up a complex resource hierarchy that exhibits all three allowed orderings: GROUP_ALTERNATE, GROUP_SEQUENCED, GROUP_UNORDERED (see DObjectMap).
Sample4 The Sample4 class provides a Sample4.main(java.lang.String[]) method which gives a demo of instantiating a new DObject from an RDF description stored in an external file.
Sample5 The Sample5 class provides a Sample5.main(java.lang.String[]) method which gives a demo of building a simple DObject using anonymous groups, and persisting that instance within the DataStore.
Sample6 The Sample6 class provides a Sample6.main(java.lang.String[]) method which gives a demo of building a simple DObject using anonymous groups, writing the instance out as an RDF description in Notation3.
